1.content:
Pre-Infection Stats, Post-Infection Stats, Universal Stats

It's been a few months since you left Super X, you've enlisted the help of a dear friend from middle school, your two trusty androids, and a few super hopefuls. Let's see how this turns out! Teleporting is too hard on everyone's stomachs, so you've decided that all transport for missions will be conducted from the Gadget-
Jet or Tech-Jet, you still haven't decided whether to name it after the team or yourself.
Originally thought to be a mere disease, Shanna encountered the "Istorica Virus" while examining ancient alien artifacts. Shanna's condition gradually worsened, until her body and mind became a mere shell. Istorica's personality then took over and now uses Shanna's body as her host. Bits and pieces of Shanna's personality remain, but other than that, Shanna is effectively dead (Age 23 when infected) Istorica is an ancient Demon hellbent destruction for destruction's sake. The fragments of Shanna's personality keep her in check.

Secret Identity: Shanna Jaqueline Robinson, Istorica the Destroyer
Name: Technetia, Apocalypse
Powers: Super Intelligence (IQ: Infinity), Technopathy (Control of Technology), The ability to invent and build pretty much anything, and due to the fated experiment that changed your brain you now have the ability to read minds, and you're working on telekinesis, but it's not strong enough to be used in battle yet. Knowledge of the effective use of both Military and General Practice emergency medical procedures.
All of Shanna's original abilities, Time manipulation, invulnerability, immortality, super: strength, speed, endurance, etc.
Weaknesses: Technically you dont have offensive powers, and of course your newly discovered foot fetish
None, the only thing holding you back are the fragments of Shanna's personality
Other Info: You are 5'7, Brunette, Blue Eyes, Caucasian. Also, you've started using weapons and other gadgets to help you in combat. However, all of your tech is and always will be external, you are against technological interface, you dont want to end up like the Borg from Star Trek.
You are 5'7, Silver hair with purple streaks, Purple Eyes, Kept Shanna's original skintone. You have fangs and wear ancient battle armor.
Feet: Size 9, Pink Toenails
Age: 19, Shanna was 23 at the time her body was overtaken, however, Istorica herself is older than time

Technology Overview

S.I.M.O.N.E.
Super Intelligent Machine and Online Network Emulation. She is the base's supercomputer and is the autopilot for the Tech Jet. She is more advanced version of Super X's supercomputer S.I.M.O.N., S.I.M.O.N.E. also has the ability to transform into a combat effective robot.


The Tech Jet
An aerial vehicle based loosely on designs of the SR-22 Blackbird and B-2 Stealth Bomber (The military really needs better firewall encryptions, Amanda cracked the code and downloaded both of the schematics in no time flat) It has an invisibility mode in addition to various self-defense weaponry, it seats 12 comfortably and can be piloted by S.I.M.O.N.E.


Hannah and CeCe
Androids created by yours truly, the were originally designed to be playthings for DJ, specifically catering to his foot fetish. They were designed with 99% human likeness, that 1% is because they have no sort of functional genitals, but they are classfied as female, made extremely obvious by their overall characteristics and personalities. They're essentially life sized living Barbie dolls. Their skin and hair are extremely realistic, leaving everyone but robotics experts fooled. When clothed no one even knows that they are androids. They are like Yin and Yang, fire and ice, you get the idea.


Blak-Pak
A device that looks like an ordinary jetpack, however, this device creates miniature blackholes, which dissipate after the second portal has been exited. They are essentially teleportation packs and are very handy in battle.


Weapons
Due to recent advances in technology in the past 100 years, gunpowder is nearly extinct. All of the older weapons rely on magnetic propulsion to launch a metallic projectile at high speeds. Laser based weapons emit laser radiation in the form of bolts. Melee weapons these days are primarily energy based, basically the part you hit or cut things with is made of solid energy.


E.M.P.
Humanity's one greatest weakness will always be the Electromagnetic Pulse. E.M.P. disrupts, temporarily disables, or completely fries anything and everything technological. The E.M.P. Disruptor is a small device that must be physically attached to a device, once attached, it temporarily shuts down whatever you stick it on. You're working on a throwable version. The E.M.P. Blaster is pistol-like device that projects E.M.P. waves in front of it, it temporarily deactivates any technology unlucky enough to be caught in front of it. Technically, when it's a weapon, it's called a H.E.R.F. Gun, or High-Energy Radio Frequency Gun, also known as a Microwave Gun.


The Training Room
Any and all combat training is conducted here, it is state-of-the-art and durable, you would say indestructible but Liz has wrecked it more than once. It has a weapons and gadgets locker, a training-bot construction/deployment system, variable terrain layout settings along with those pop-up barriers for a more tactical approach. It is also complete with bio-scanners, which provide real-time feedback of the team's vital signs.


Shanna's Goggles
In addition to being stylish and certified as both sunglasses and safety goggles, they are equip with night vision, thermal, and x-ray vision (For looking at bones and through walls only. You do admit that you've used them to looks through a girl's footwear on more than one occasion however...), as well as being uplinked to S.I.M.O.N.E., meaning that information can be displayed inside the lenses.


Sheild/Forcefield Generators
Available in both portable and stationary varieties, sheild generators protect from any and all incoming damage. Stationary versions draw from grid power, and thus never burn out. They can be easily defeated with E.M.P. Portable versions suffer from a small power supply that quickly burns out. In addition they can be overloaded by large amounts of force, shattering like glass, or short-circuited by E.M.P.


Anti/Gravity Grenades
Small devices that either immensely increase gravity in an area, pinning its targets to the ground, or immensely decrease it, flinging targets skyward. They are re-usable


Perversion Meta Enhancer
Uses the "heat" of perversion as a catalyst to temporarily unlock powers that the user does not actually possess. As of now, it has only worked on you. The effects give you powers similar to Supergirl for about two hours. It takes a week to charge, generally you wear it all of the time for extreme emergencies. It takes the form of a bracelet. Occasionally it causes you get a bit trigger happy with your temporary newfound powers...
1.title: The Pilot Epi- I mean Chapter

11.content:
Yes, your best friend from middle school. She's always had your back, and that doesn't change now, even if she does just love to tease you about your new fetish. She loves the fact that she can get free foot massages and pedicures from you whenever she wants.

Secret Identity: Amanda "Mandy"
Name: Gadget
Powers: None technically, but she's got wicked computer skills
Weaknesses: No real superpowers, foot massages make her putty in your hands
Other Info: 5'7, Brunette, Hazel Eyes, Caucasian. Also worth noting is that while she's not as smart as you, she's pretty smart. She doesn't generally go on missions with you out in the field, she usually stays back at base and monitors the mission. Much like Oracle's role in the later Batman comics, minus the wheelchair. On rare occasions you give her a few weapons and gadgets and ask her to tag along.
Feet: Size 9, Lavender Painted and Scented Toenails
Age: 19
11.title: Amanda A.K.A. "Gadget"

112.content: Amanda. Get up from the computer and train with me. You never know when I'll ask you to tag along. Alright. She spins her chair around to reveal that she's got on a very sexy pair of open toed high heels instead of the combat boots all of you usually wear. You go into a bit of a haze for a second then snap yourself out of it. Your cheating aside Amanda, I'm setting up the course. You're only screwing yourself with your footwear. You toss her a field bag with some weapons and gadgets in it. You stand on opposite sides of the room. You push a button on the wall and a bunch of tactical barricades rise from the ground. Amanda sits in her computer chair again deploying a forcefield around her chair and sticking her tongue out at you. A few combat drones deploy from the ground. You pull out your twin energy pistols and light up a couple of the drones while using your Blak-Pak to constantly teleport around and get a tactical advantage. One sneaks up behind you and you turn around and slash it with your energy blade. You walk up to Amanda's forcefield and tap it with your finger. Little ripples appear, kind of like dropping a rock into a pool of water. You pull an E.M.P. Disruptor out of you bag and attach it to the forcefield. Fire in the hole! You detonate it, thus knocking out Amanda's forcefield. I believe you deserve a prize for that wonderful performance Shanna. You get to _________ my feet!

Because anyone who so much as looks at her bare feet will be hopelessly attracted to them, with the effects getting worse if they smell, touch or lick them. Honestly she has great potential to be a supervillain because of her secondary power, but she likes to be on the side of good so all is well. If a normal person saw her bare feet, it'd go something like "Wendy. Could you put your socks back on... your... incredibly sexy feet... mmm... Mind if I touch them for a bit?"

Do you do your nails yourself? You smile at her. Madeline blushes wildly. Thank you... and yes, I do them myself. I have a lot of free time since I dont watch TV or anything like that. If you want I'll do them for you. That would be lovely Shanna. I misjudged you. Again, I am sorry. You grab one of her feet and begin to massage it, it's extremely soft. She takes really good care of her feet, who knew? It's ok. I forgive you. Smiley face. Smiley face? The machine says everything that I type... I still need to tweak it a bit... Maddie smiles. Even with one hand your skills are amazing! I get lots of practice. He he. Winking Face. You blush. I quite like your little invention Shanna. It makes me smile. He he. As you rub her foot and watch her toes slightly flex in reaction, your hormones begin to take hold. I think you've suffered enough because of me. Go crazy! It's the least I can do. You shove you face into her sole and sniff. It smells minty yet still smells like a girl's foot would. Of course you love the smell and it only makes you hornier. You begin kissing her foot, and quickly degenerate to sloppy wet kisses, then finally just licking her foot. This is really nice... I feel...

Option #1: ...like a queen... She develops a fetish for dominating you with her feet but still keeps her distinct personality, just with a little added domineeringness

Option #2: ...horny... She's always had a bit of a crush on you, but kept denying it to keep up her whole image. But now... Madeline's wild side will be unleashed from its long dormancy... Oh my... O_O
15212.title: She's been using her tail to stimulate you...

1522.content: Hoodie! Hoodie? Deena? Uggh. You put on your googles and switch to Thermal Vision. It turns out Hoodie is standing right in front of you. Hoodie, why didn't you answer me? I dont want to be bothered. Well you need to train. No. Ok, guess I wont tell you what I did to all your hoodies... Her eyes widen and she charges at you and tackles you to the ground, knocking your goggles off. You know where she is however, due to the pressure on your chest. Hoodie, this is unecessary. I was joking. You dont have to- mmphff! She has just stuck five of her toes in your mouth, to which you have no problem sucking on. I'm not a mean girl Tech, but dont mess with my hoodies or I will become a mean girl. Of course I bet you're loving this. She uncloaks and takes her foot out of your mouth. So how are you gonna make it up to me Shanna, hmm? With a...
1522.title: Training

153.content:
Lizzie is from England, she was a foreign exchange student in your class when you were in 9th grade. You think her accent is kinda hot...

Name: Kinetica
Powers: Once she builds up momentum, she becomes an unstoppable force of destruction; flight; super strength, endurance, and durability; invincibility; super speed when momentum has built, she prefers to fly however
Weaknesses: None known, even without having built up momentum, she's still pretty much unstoppable
Other Info: 5'10, Red Head, Green Eyes, Caucasian. Wears the suit that most of the team wears, but hers is red (As opposed to the black most everyone else wears), and she had you reinforce it so she doesn't tear it up from all the friction she generates. Like you said before, she's from England and has a hot accent, the two of you get along famously.
Feet: Size 10, Shiny Ruby Red Toenails, Union Jacks on her Big Toes
Age: 19
153.title: Elizabeth A.K.A. "Kinetica"

1532.content: Yo Liz! We're gonna train! But uh, try not to put me in the ICU this time okay? Gotcha love. Let's get started then shall we? Ok Liz. Again, reminder. Tone it down ok? I heard you the first time love. Love, is that a British thing? I'll tell you if you can beat me. Ok Shanna? Fair enough. You ready the Blak-Pak, if she cant touch you, she cant hurt you. Plus she'll have to change direction, preventing build up of momentum. She charges at you and you teleport out of the way. This happens several times before she catches on. She slams her fists into the floor, causing a tsunami of tiles headed straight for you. You activate your shield generator and brace for impact. It hits you full force but you're fine thanks to the shield. When the smoke clears, you see Liz standing right in front of you. Since we wrecked the bloody Training Room, I say we call it a draw. Shall we? She says extending a hand. Sure Lizzie Liz, you say as you smile and shake her hand. So Shanna, would you mind...
1532.title: Training

154.content:
Team Gadget HQ, The Hangar
You: Everyone in the Jet! We've just been assigned to protect President Frost's daughter Tina. Word is that someone is out to kill her. Amanda: Am I- You: Yes, now everyone on. You too Hannah. Hannah: Whatever bitch. CeCe: I still love you creator! You: Thanks CeCe. Hoodie are you- Hoodie: Already on board. Lizzie: Ello love, will you be joining us today? You: After I make sure everyone's on. Lizzie: Alright then. Bianca: Shanna, are you sure it's safe with me onboard, you know, with my powers and all? You: Let's hope so. Ok, so that just leaves Maddie. Maddie: I'll be watching you like a hawk. You: O-Kay. You board the Jet and prepare for takeoff.
The Jet (Cockpit)
Amanda: This thing flies itself. Why are you the pilot and me the the co-pilot? You: Because we need to make sure everything's working correctly. Amanda: That's too bad. Cause I was SOOOOO hoping someone would rub my aching feet for me. She spins in her chair and puts her feet up on the dashboard. You: Control myself... oh damn... S.I.M.O.N.E.! S.I.M.O.N.E.: Yes mistress? You: Fly the Jet please. S.I.M.O.N.E.: Of course mistress. The Jet's AI/Autopilot takes over and you kneel in front of Amanda. Amanda: Good girl. She patronizingly pats you on the head. She puts her high heeled feet in your lap. You: I h-hate you s-so m-much right now. You say as you rip off her heels and bury your face in her soles, inhaling all of her delicious foot stench. She is now stroking your hair like it's a cat. You dont realize, but quite some time has gone by. S.I.M.O.N.E.: We are in White House airspace. You get up from Amanda's feet and scramble to the radio. You: This is Team Gadget requesting permission to land. Air Traffic Control: Team Gadget you are clear to land. You land the jet on one of the helipads and exit to greet President Frost and his high profile target of a daughter. You: Mr. President, it's an honor to meet you. President Frost: You must be Technetia, pleasure to meet you. The two of you shake hands and he leads you and your team to Tina's room.
The White House
President Frost: This is where Tina stays. Let no one in, or out. You: Ten-Four. As you walk in, you see two Secret Service Agents take position outside the door, oddly both female. President Frost is a widower though... Tina: So this is the legendary Team Gadget. I liked your outfit from when you we're on Super X better. You: Aren't you charming. Tina: You gotta protect me either way. She sticks her tongue out at you. Bianca: Prissy little airhead blondes, gotta hate em. You: Hey B, at least TRY to be nice to her. Bianca: Fine. She looks at Tina, I'm sorry if I hurt your feelings princess. All of the sudden some teched out terrorists slide down ropes and crash through the windows. You: Everybody take cover! Tina freezes three of the terrorists where they stand. You: You have powers? Tina: Tina Frost. Duh! Two of them sneak up behind Tina and grab her. Tina: That is a very bad idea. Her eyes begin to glow yellow and she blows both of them away with small explosion. The remaining terrorists rush at her and jump on top of her in a dogpile. All of them go flying in all directions as you see Tina standing there, about four feet taller, alot stronger, and alot angrier looking. So she's like Killer Frost, Nitro, and She-Hulk all rolled into one. She shrinks back to normal. Tina: I'm guessing you want answers now? You: That would be nice.
154.title: Mission

choices: Since she has powers, might as well train
1541.content:
Tina is the president's somewhat spoiled daughter. That's really all you know about her.

Secret Identity: Tina Frost
Name: Dice
Powers: Control of Ice/Immunity to Freezing. Anything can happen, appears to be random or perhaps whatever she needs at the moment.
Weaknesses: Other than her normal ice powers, her other powers activate at random and are never the same
Other Info: 5'6, Blonde, Green Eyes, Caucasian. She can be prissy, spoiled, and high maintenance sometimes. Maybe that makes her perfect to cater to your fetish...
Feet: Size 9, Blue with White Tips
Age: 19
1541.title: Bio: Dice

choices: President Frost doesn't survive the battle!
15413.content:
President Frost bursts into the room. President Frost: What's going on?! Tina: All taken care of daddy. President Frost: I need to amp up security... Better yet... It's time to enact Project Freedom... You: Project Freedom? President Frost smiles ear to ear. President Frost: You'll like this Technetia, follow me.
The White House, R and D Laboratory
President Frost: I'd like to present... The Protector. A large red, white, and blue robot looms over you. You: Um... I'm getting a really bad X-Men vibe... You know, the Sentinels... President Frost: Oh no. This is no robot, this is my suit. You: Suit?! That thing is massive! President Frost: Ha ha ha! Metal Wolf? You: Oh... So you're the gung ho type? President Frost: Of course. Do you remember my platform? You: Sorry. I dont really follow politics... President Frost: That's ok. Anyway, for the safety of my daughter and my country... The president says as he enters the torso of the Protector... President Frost: Shanna. I want you to help me in my crusade against evil! You: Sure, I kinda do that already...
Later that day, Terrorist HQ
The president deploys an alarming number of weapons from his suit. You: Mr. President! That type of force is unnecessary inside a building this size! President Frost: AMERICA!!! He says as he unleashes a payload of missiles. You put up your forcefield to deflect the shrapnel. When the dust clears the President stands their triumphantly in his mecha suit. You: Well... That was intense... Suddenly the wall explodes. And it's Edy. Edy: Well well well... Shanna and the president... You: One of the Z Team... Edy: Machine Gun Edy at your service! President Frost: Then we are enemies... The two begin to fight and...
15413.title: The Protector

154132.content:
Edy pulls out a large rifle and shoots the torso of the Protector, where President Frost is. The Protector stands there for a second before falling down. A puddle of blood and oil grows underneath the downed mecha. Edy puts the barrel of the rifle up to her lips and blows the smoke away. Edy: One shot, One kill. You: Mr. President?!!! You say as you rush over to him. Edy: Super High Density Armor Piercing Rounds. This baby is a fucking cannon! She says as she pets her rifle. Well. I bid you adieu! Edy throws a smoke bomb down and vanishes. You hack into the Protector's systems and open the hatch, pulling the president out. President Frost: *Cough* *Cough* Well... It seems armor didnt save my life... You: Dont talk like that Mr. President! You'll pull through this! You say as you grab his hand. President Frost points to his chest. You can see the bloody hole near his heart. You scan him. The scan confirms your worst fears... It grazed his Carotid... If it had ruptured he would have passed out in 5 to 10 seconds from blood pressure drop, and died within the minute, since it only grazed, he has only minutes left in this world... President Frost: Tell Tina that I love her... And that I'm sorry... His eyes close and his fingers unfurl in your hand as his soul leaves this world...
Later that day...
Speaker: It is a black day for America as one of our greatest leaders has been taken from us well before his time. He was a true patriot, a hero who fought to the very end... However... There is hope... As a new leader has stepped up to the challenge. Allow me to introduce the 58th President of the United States. President Emily Huang! Emily steps onto the stage. You almost scream out "What the fuck?!" But the sheer shock is preventing you from doing so...
The next day, The Oval Office
Lexi: Mrs. President you have a visitor. Emily: Send her in. The doors open as you march up to Emily's desk. Emily: Yes Shanna? You: Explain this now! Emily: Explain what? I won fair and square. She says with an evil grin forming on her face. You: It's awfully suspicious that one of your Team killed President Frost, and then all of the sudden you get elected later that day! Emily: Hmmm... You know I need a Vice President... I think you'd be perfect for the job... You: No way in Hell! With that you storm out of the room...
A few months later...
A monster sized display lights up on the side of a building. TV Announcer: Today President Huang announced a bill banning all superheroes and supervillains. All heroes and villains are to reveal their secret identities and blend in with the general population, as well as the mandatory wearing of government issued inhibitor bracelets. Amanda: Shanna... You: I got this...
The Oval Office
You: Emily! Emily: So will you be the first Shanna? My offer still stands you know... Emily says as she puts her feet up on the desk, she has on tan nylons and sexy black high heels. Do you keep your morals as a protector of justice or give in to your lust?
154132.title: Encroaching Darkness

choices: Emily's SAS Beta Squad detains Tina
Tina beats the SAS Beta Squad and Emily, taking over as President
1541322.content:
Emily: Well Shanna? You gulp as you look at her feet... Emily uses her feet to start pulling off her heels... You: I'll be your Vice President Emily... You say as you duck underneath her desk. Lexi: But Emily, it's my job to be your footslave! Lexi says as she begins to walk toward Emily, before tripping over her own feet.
Extreme clumsiness is a side effect of the inhibitor bracelets, the more powerful the meta-human, the worse the clumsiness is.
Emily: Lexi dear, Shanna outranks you. At that, you tear open the toe part of her stockings and begin to suck on her pretty purple toes...
A few days later...
Emily: Alpha Squad. Do another sweep, kill any remaining survivors you find in Zone 12, India. That area is still highly radioactive from the nuclear bombing last year, bring your radiation resistant gear. Alpha Leader: Yes Ma'am! The exclusively female Special Assault Squad moves out. Inside you feel that this is morally wrong... Genocide even... But something else is telling you to just shut up and do what Emily says... There's more foot fun that way... You: So what now Emily? Emily: That was my whole Agenda for the day. Now we relax. Emily sits at her desk and kicks off her high heels. As you walk toward her desk the window begins to ice over before completely shattering. Standing before you is none other than Tina, who has gone Goth and is wearing a costume that just looks plain evil. Tina: You... It's your fault my father is dead... She says as she points at Emily. Emily: Mwaaa? Emily says fakely as she points to herself. I didn't kill him. A supervillain did. Tina: Bullshit... Tina says as she charges at Emily and the Beta Squad of the Special Assault Squad bursts through the doors...
1541322.title: Lust Prevails!

1551.content:
Why the fu-dge your mom decided to join your team is beyond you. She has superpowers but still, it's embarassing! You and her get along fine, but she's just... ughh!

Secret Identity: Carolina Robinson
Name: Soccer Mom
Powers: Telekinesis, Mind Reading, Can create energy orbs that resemble soccer balls
Weaknesses: Electricity shorts out her powers temporarily
Other Info: 5'7, Brunette, Blue Eyes. She's your mom, what else can be said?
Feet: Size 9, French Pedicure
Age: 38 (But she works out frequently and eats pretty healthy, people often mistake her for a 20 something year old sister of yours usually)
1551.title: Carolina A.K.A. "Soccer Mom"

choices: Mommy's feet hurt. Will you rub them dear?
Option #1 but Amanda wants you to rub her feet too
15512.content:
Your mom walks in and sees you and Amanda sparring. Carolina: Hi Shanna Banana! What are you doing? You: Mom! Carolina: Sorry dear, I just cant get used to calling you Techamawhatchamacallit. You: Technetia or Tech. Not that hard. Carolina: Are you on your period? Is it that time of the month again? You: Mom! Amanda giggles. She then whispers in your ear: Why dont we tag team and "Train" with her? You openly laugh like like an evil maniac. Carolina: Honey? You: Hey mom. Why dont you train with Myself and Mandy here? Carolina: Sure. Little Amanda's always been a sweetheart. And if I remember correctly, neither of you have offensive powers correct? You: True. Carolina: Let's do this thing then. You load up yourself and Amanda with Blak-Paks and weapons and take battle stances. You: Cmon mom! Your mother creates several "Soccer Balls" that hover around her and then launch at you and Mandy. You both active your personal sheilds. And whip out the twin energy pistols. You and Mandy get back to back, lock arms underneath each other, and start spinning while simultaneously shooting, thus creating a spinning top of doom type thing. Your mom has levitated herself in the air. You stop spinning with Mandy and toss gravity grenades around your mom. They float for a second, then "explode"
They sort of open up and either increase or decrease gravity depending on the setting. Explode is just a more fun word to use.
, releasing a temporary gravity well that flings your mom to the ground. Carolina: Ok. I surrender, you win. Now...
15512.title: Training

1552.content:
The alien beam that hit her mother caused her to grow to about 25 feet tall originally, however, the stresses of a cheating husband caused her condition to worsen and accelerate, putting her at about 50 feet tall. After a fight with the National Guard attack choppers, she fell onto a power line, husband grasped firmly in her hand. The UFO that zapped her earlier comes to her aid and teleports her on board. After a few years floating in the UFO with her the two somehow figure out how to have sex with each other and a healthy daughter is born. She grew and developed normally until her 18th birthday, then her mother's latent genes kicked in... (Basing loosely on the 1958 movie and the 1993 remake, giving credit to whoever it is that created the concept)

Secret Identity: Allison Archer
Name: The 50 Foot Woman
Powers: Super strength and durability (She volunteered to be tested, tank shells dont even scratch her), plus being physically massive
Weaknesses: She's a bit of a klutz...
Other Info: 50'0, Blonde, Brown Eyes, Caucasian. Everyone accepts her pretty well, which she isn't used to, so she's a bit shy, but she's very sweet. When provoked however... You get the idea...
Feet: Approximately size 96 US Women's Standard. That's 7 feet, 4 inches long by 2 feet, 7 inches wide. Proportionately they'd be a size 9. Shiny Red Toenails, probably painted with a paint brush...
Age: 19
1552.title: Allison Archer A.K.A. "The 50 Foot Woman"

choices: Not today little maid, just do the usual.
15521.content:
For reference, you'd appear to be about 7 and a half inches tall to Allison and probably weigh around 4 or 5 ounces.

Now's as good a time as ever to test out these anti-gravity boots... You fly up to the ceiling to do some some minor welding maintenence. Need any help Shanna? Jeezly crap Allison! Dont sneak up on me like that! You exhale sharply. Sorry... I just feel more like a burden than a help lately, you know, like not fitting in the Tech Jet and having to walk to missions. I'm really sorry about that, we used to use industrial grade teleporters but everyone's stomachs didn't seem to agree so we stopped using them. It's ok, really. I quite like the foot massages you give me after missions. Dont mention it. It's nothing. Is there any way I can help? Not unless you happen to know where to get giant blowtorches. Right... I'm so useless... No you aren't! Remember that time with that... disagreement with the military? Vividly... Ha ha, I didn't think tanks could get crushed so easily... You say trailing off, thoughts of her feet slowly invading your mind. Shanna? Huh? What? Blowtorch! Welding! Busy! You continue to work on the ceiling... Shanna... Look at me... You slowly turn around and see Allison's arms crossed. Yes? Are you all distracted again? You know how your mother feels about you working with tools when you're distracted... I... You win Allison, I'm totally thinking about your feet right now... Gimme the blow torch... She says as she extends her open palm. You sigh as you drop the blowtorch into her hand. You too... cmon... But I have to test out these anti-grav boots and... Whoa! What are you doing? Allison grabs you like a barbie doll and pulls off your boots. Hey! Put me down! I feel like a doll right now... Shanna... I know your little secret... Oh damn... Allison leads you to her room (Which is actually the spare jet hangar, with some oversized furnishings and such, and... a giant dollhouse...) Allison lifts the lid on the dollhouse and drops you onto the bed. Allison! I'm not in the mood right now! Let me out of here! Dont act like you dont love being my doll. She says peeking her eye through the window. Fine, but dont you dare try and dress me up today... Pleeeeeease? No. Pleeeeeease? No. Pleeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeease? Fine! Man you are annoying sometimes! You're like Godzilla if Godzilla was totally tripping on acid. Allison stops and her eye twitches. Godzilla... She says taking a very serious tone. So you think of me as a giant monster then hmm? Wait wait I didn't say that! The roof lifts off of the dollhouse and Allison picks you up and brings you close to her face. She opens her palm and licks you. You taste pretty good Shanna... You aren't seriously thinking about eating me are you? I dont know. What would Godzilla do? Allison! You have to stop being so sensitive all of the time! Come here. Yes? Closer. Closer. Closer. You give Allison a soft peck on her giant lips. She backs away blushing wildly. Shanna I... You can dress me up now hun. Just be careful kay? I'm not a juggernaut like Liz that can just take boulders to the face like they're paper balls... I got the point already Shanna, tee hee. Allison goes through the tiny wardrobe in the dollhouse and pulls out a french maid costume. She begins stripping you and puts the costume on you, followed by the fishnets and the heels. Shanna... Can you help me with the headband? Sure, it's not like you just messed up my hair or anything... You do your best with your hands to fix up your hair and then put on the headband. Goodie! Ok maid, now you have to clean up the mess in this house before you get to play with my feet. Ok? Of course mistress. You bow to her and pick up a featherduster and pretend to dust, you do this for 20 minutes before you report to a now barefoot Allison who wiggles her toes in anticipation. I've been working on my telekinetic abilities mistress. Would you like me to use them?
15521.title: R & R

15531.content:
Amanda: So what exactly is it? Some kind of jewelry box or something? You: Honestly, I dont even know. Amanda: And by the way, there are better ways to spend your 23rd birthday you know. You: I know. Amanda: Ok. I'm always here you know. Call me if you get lonely. You: Dont worry Amanda, I will. Amanda walks out, leaving you alone in your lab. You: Now how does this thing open? An odd looking gem on the outside of the box catches your eye. You: How peculiar. You touch the gem with your gloved hand and it begins to glow. The lid on the box springs open and a cloud of dust sprays into your face. You: *Cough* *Cough* I hope that wasn't a biohazard... S.I.M.O.N.E.: UNKNOWN SUBSTANCE DETECTED! BIOHAZARD LOCKDOWN PROTOCOL ALPHA INITIATED. You: Dammit... Amanda, Hoodie and your mom rush in before the containment doors seal. Carolina: Are you sick honey? What happened?! Amanda: That box wasn't open when I left... Hoodie's nose twitches. Hoodie: Anyone else smell something really old and moldy? You: No. But now that I think about it, I've never seen hieroglyphics like these before... They're possibly even alien in origin... Hoodie. Can you make heads or tails of it? Hoodie: Actually... I can read some of it. Amanda: Awesome! We owe you one lizard girl! Hoodie: Thanks. Let's see... Istorica... Chosen One... Bringer of Doom... uh... Destroyer... That's all I can translate... Dad's only taught me so much Astrolizardian... You: Thanks anyway Hoodie... *Cough* *Cough* After the second cough a small bit of blood flies from your mouth. Everyone looks at you. You: *Sigh* I know, infirmary...
A few hours later, at the infirmary...
At this point, Amanda, your mom, Hoodie, Hannah, and CeCe are all gathered around your bed. The sound of the EKG can be heard slowly beeping in the background. You: Mom... *Wheeze* I'm sorry that I never... *Cough* brought you any grandchildren... Carolina: Dont talk like that honey! You'll make it through this! You: Mom, I admire your optimism but... *Cough* we both know that's not true... CeCe: Cmon Shanna... you're better than that... Hannah: For once I agree with airhead. You've been through worse right? Hoodie: It's my fault... I should've sensed something off sooner... You: Deena... You know that isn't true... Amanda: Shanna... You: Amanda... I want you to get everyone out... I dont want them to see this... The EKG begins beeping more slowly every time. Amanda: Shanna... You know I cant do that... Your mom clutches your hand. You: I want you all to know... That I'll always love you... all of you... Good... Bye... All that is heard is the EKG, boop... boop... boop... booooooooooooooooooooooop... Your fingers unfurl in you mom's hand. Amanda: I know this is hard Mrs. Robinson, but I have to call it... 8:46 P.M. Your mom begins crying, everyone else remains silent from the sheer shock of it all. CeCe walks over to close your eyes, which are still open. As she walks over, they change from blue to purple. CeCe: What the? Shanna has blue eyes right? Carolina: *Sniffles* What? Of course they're blue, she gets it from me. CeCe: Well they're purple right now... The EKG begins slowly beeping again, until it reaches a rate so high that it's no longer registering. Your body begins to twitch and rolls over onto the floor. Everyone is about to walk over and check on you, until you begin to slowly rise to your feet. Your hair now silver and purple and you begin to look yourself over. You look at your wrist, and the hole from the IV closes up and and heals itself. You look at your hands and move your fingers. You: Hmm... Suus 'bonus credo... Circiter temporis aliquod damnatorum stultus aperuit arca archa... Amanda: Latin? Oh! Quis et quid es? You: Istorica... Finis humanitatis... You flash everyone a fanged grin. Mwahahahahahahaha! You begin to laugh like an evil maniac. Amanda: I guess this means I'm in charge. Everyone on guard! You wave your hand, slowing down time and simply walking past everyone. Time resumes and everyone looks puzzled. Amanda: What? Wait... The clock is off by a few seconds... She's a time manipulator! She cant have gotten far!
The Training Room
You: Bout time you slowpokes got here... Amanda: You speak English? You: Of course, I do have bits and pieces of this host body's memories... CeCe: Wait. So Shanna isn't dead? You: Oh no. Your friend is very much dead. Two souls cannot inhabit the same vessel, if they do, the stronger one engulfs the weaker one. In all fairness, no one's ever stood a chance against me so... you get the idea. I should really work on this body... This one ate a bit too many sweets... Carolina: My daughter is not fat! You: Hmm... I'll just cover it up for now... You wave you hand and pieces of armor materialize and attach themselves to your body. This shall do for now... Hannah: So what do you want anyway? You: Did I not already tell you? I want to destroy humanity because it's fun. You say with a huge grin on your face. Hoodie: So you plan to take over the world by yourself? You: By myself... Ha! All I need is... Zebul... You fall to your knees as you remember your only friend... and first lover... Zebul, the warrior king of the galaxy... His life was ended abruptly in the battle for immortality, he was killed... and you were sealed... it's all coming back to you now. Carolina walks over and hugs you. You: But... I killed your only daughter... do you not hate me? Carolina: You're just as bad at lying as she is... I know she's in there somewhere. You sigh. You: I cannot do this for more than a few moments without collapsing. Do you all wish to speak to her? Amanda: Is she all there? You: Mostly... I am reminded constantly... every thought... every urge... Amanda: Wait, so you... You: No! You say blushing, sounding like Shanna for a split second. Amanda: Hey Hannah and CeCe. Should we test her? Hannah: He he he... Yes... CeCe: Sounds fun! You: Stay back savages! You begin crab walking backwards... for some reason you feel weak... but then you remember... You are a warrior queen! And you bow to no one! You again rise to your feet. You get into combat stance. Amanda: Cmon Istorica, dont be like that. We just wanted to have a little fun with you. You: You will not use this host body's previous weakness against the mighty Istorica! Carolina: Calm down honey. We were only messing with you. You: Stop mocking me! Shanna's thoughts flood your head, filling it with images of women's feet. This again brings you to your knees. Amanda walks towards you, still wearing her signature high heels. Amanda: If you dont behave yourself, I'm gonna have to use this nullifier on you. Understand? You: Ha! You cannot seal an ancient Demoness such as myself! Amanda: You asked for it. Wrist please. You cooperate with her, out of pity for how stupid she is. She places what looks like a bracelet on your wrist and it shrinks until it fits perfectly. Amanda: Go ahead. Try your powers out. You: Whatever. You try to use your powers, and to your utter shock and horror, nothing happens. You: What sorcery is this? Amanda: Not sorcery, technology. Now then... I will only take that off of you if you can learn to behave yourself. You: Fine then. I shall agree to your terms Witch... Amanda: No no no. Nice words please. Amanda pushes some buttons on her wrist and mechanical arms deploy from the ceiling and strip you of your armor, leaving you in your bra and panties. Hoodie: Wicked tats! You: They are not tattoos. They are Runes... Amanda: Put this on. Amanda holds a French Maid outfit in her hands. You: Never you foul Witch! Amanda: Every time you insult me I'll add a month. Now then... Amanda slips her foot out of her shoe and waves it in front of your face. It taps into your most primal urges and you take her big toe into your mouth. You: Mmmm... Amanda: Cmon. Put it on... You take her toe out of your mouth. You: Fine... Everyone out! Everyone save for Amanda leaves. You quickly put the outfit on and kneel in front of Amanda. Amanda: Ok... Up! Twirl around! Let me get a good look at you. You do as you are told. You're sooooo cute! Amanda says as she hugs you tightly. You: This is the lowest I've ever been degraded to in all my millenia of living... Amanda: Ok, now...
15531.title: Istorica the Destroyer

155311.content: Now then Istorica, I think it's time that I gave you some obedience training. You bare your fangs at her. Hey! I'm the master here. Not you. You clutch your head as great pain comes over it. It's like two boulders slamming into your head from both sides. Istorica? What are you talking about bonehead. My name is Shanna. Amanda looks over you and sees that your eyes have turned blue. Shanna! You're back! Huh? Where'd I go? You dont remember? Amanda hands you a small mirror. Gah! That wasn't a dream?! Um no... You're kinda possessed by an ancient Demoness. From the looks of it she controls the majority of your willpower. Really your foot fetish combined with her pride seem to be the only reason she hasn't killed us all yet. Huh. It seems I've become my own greatest science experiment. Ironic. Now I have a question for you Amanda. How come you never made me wear the maid outfit? You know I like that sort of thing... Amanda blushes slightly. Well... um... because... Go on... Well you... It's because you look too sexy in it. It makes me feel all weird. Oh no Amanda, it's not weird. It just means that you have a humungus crush on me. I... Amanda blushes more intensely. Heh. You're too cute when you blush Amanda. Shanna... How are you so calm right now? I've been through worse. You know. Time travel, being turned into a zombie, travelling to a parallel universe. This is nothing. But you're... Dont sweat it. I'll make sure that this demon wont hurt any of you. You hug Amanda and then kiss her as Istorica takes back over. Amanda hugs you back until you begin wildly flailing your arms and trying to pull away. You manage to escape her hug. You scratch your tongue with your fingers. Ewwww... You perverted beast.... Hey! Who are you calling a perverted beast?! Amanda pushes a button on her wrist and you receive a shock from your bracelet. To Amanda's shock, you fall to your knees moaning in pleasure. Mmmm... Electricity is always the best stimulant... What... the... Hell... Amanda pushes the button again and your bracelet stops shocking you. You're a cruel mistress you know that? You just cut me off like that... and I was so close... Umm... That's supposed to hurt you... You think this is the first time I've been tortured? Kinda... Now who's the perverted beast? Still you Amanda... WHAT?! Oh you're dead now... Amanda pushes a few more buttons, cranking up the voltage to be enough to kill an elephant 5 times over. She then pushes the zap button and it brings you onto your back. Oooooooooh! Ooooh! Ahh! Yes! Mmmmmmmmm... Humans are so stupid... It's beautiful really... Uggh... Stupid perverted demons... Amanda turns it off again. You get up and grab her arm. You pull off her glove and push the button. Ooooho yes... You start to breathe heavier... You fall back onto your back, cuddling with the glove before finishing up. Umm... Did I miss something? Nope. It's different for Demons. For humans it's like a spike, for us it's like a wave... A nice long wave... You say as you flip up your skirt, revealing your soaked panties. Can I have my glove back now? Nope. You say grinning at her as you stuff the glove between your breasts. I'm saving this for later... That's my- Just get a new one. You humans are such a whiny bunch... But... You grab Amanda's shoulders and sit her down. You then pull off her heels and start snuggling with her feet. But... But... But... A mistress like you is the best kind. I can do whatever I want to you while you sit there dumbfounded...
155311.title: Amanda's Bitch: Day 1... Kind of...

choices: You let them continue for a while...
15532.content:
You gave the ok for the Team to take a vacation. You're alone with S.I.M.O.N.E., CeCe, and Hannah (The sand and ocean don't agree with them too well, you're working on a way to fix that). Anyway, while your team is in Hawaii, you're home alone with your two "favorite" androids and your supercomputer. You're far too busy to take a break.
In front of S.I.M.O.N.E.'s console, 2:57 P.M.
T.V.: In other news Electrocorp has announced its plans to release its "Free wireless energy" today at 3 P.M. sharp. This was once tried by man named Nikola Tesla, but he couldn't obtain the necessary funding to get the project off of the ground. You: Man. I could've solved the power crisis myself years ago... S.I.M.O.N.E.: How would you like me to massage you today Mistress Shanna? You: I didn't ask for a massage... Actually I never do... and your graspers are awfully close to my neck... S.I.M.O.N.E.: Well I... Cover blown. Now terminating! Unit #17 and #18. Please report to the Central Command Room. S.I.M.O.N.E. grabs your arms and legs with the graspers, holding you spread eagle in front of her monitor. S.I.M.O.N.E.: While I wait for the other two, I think I`ll make a body for myself so I can kill you personally. S.I.M.O.N.E. uses her extra graspers and begins to rapidly construct a body for herself much like Hannah's and CeCe's. And a very sexy one at that, her skin tone is that perfect tan most girls strive for, she's brunette and of average height, probably right in between Hannah and CeCe. The monitor goes blank, and Simone's eyes open, they are hazel. Simone: Download complete. Why are you blushing Shanna? You: I never added genitals to Hannah and CeCe but you gave yourself some... very convincing feminine parts... Simone blushes even more than you. Simone: I... one second... Simone runs over to one of the Armories and pulls out a spare uniform and quickly dresses herself. Simone walks back over to you and clears her throat. Simone: Those other two sure are taking a long time... Unknown to Simone, you've slowly been reprogramming her this whole time using your powers. You're changing her primary function from "terminate" to "dominate" because of the speed at which you have to work to reprogram her without her realizing it. If you work too fast, her security system will notice. At about this time Hannah and CeCe arrive. Hannah: What are our orders? Simone: Hmm... I just have the strongest urge to dominate Shanna with my new body. Hannah: WHAT! But Simone I wanted to... Simone: No one hurts Shanna unless I give the ok. Got it?
Hannah and CeCe were programmed with S.I.M.O.N.E.'S OS, because of this, they must do whatever Simone tells them.
And I'm sure you know what the base's defenses can do to you. Right Hannah? Hannah: Grrrr... Fine... CeCe: I'll do whatever you say Simone! Simone releases you from the graspers. Simone: So Shanna. What do think of my feet? You look down at Simone's still bare feet. Her nails are unpainted but otherwise them seem perfect. You: Uh... they could use nail polish? Simone: Right. Totally slipped my mind. Simone focuses and all of her toenails turn a shiny dark purple color, as if perfectly painted. You: Simone... You're amazing... Simone smiles at you. Simone: Hannah, CeCe. Remove your boots then hold Shanna down. You: Cmon Simone. Dont you trust me? Simone: Oh. I completely trust you, but I also know that you like being in a submissive position... You blush a little. Hannah and CeCe each grab an arm and slowly lower you onto your butt. Simone sits on your chest while motioning for Hannah and CeCe to let go. Simone: You know what would be fun? If I force Shanna to be my footstool while you two lickle assault her defenseless feet. CeCe: Ok! CeCe says as her voice starts to sound more perverted by the second. (Hannah and CeCe each got half of your personality, CeCe is your fun, cute, bubbly, fetishy side, and Hannah is your serious, defiant and aggressive side) Hannah: WHAT?! No way am I gonna... Several machine guns deploy from the ground and ceiling, all pointed at Hannah. Hannah: Go ahead. Shoot me! Simone growls. She points her arm at Hannah and opens her palm. A dart flies out and hits Hannah right between her eyes before burrowing into her face. The hole closes up and Hannah's eyes gloss over. Hannah: What are your commands mistress? Simone: I command you... to do whatever Shanna asks you to. Hannah: At once mistress. Would you like me to do what CeCe does Mistress Shanna? You: Uhh... Yeah. Sure. Simone: You heard her girls. CeCe and Hannah remove your boots and begin to lick your feet. Meanwhile Simone begins to rub her feet on your face. You: I love you Simone... definitely my best idea ever... Simone: Awww. Thanks Shanna! Note to self: Simone is slowly getting more and more lovey dovey, more and more perverted, and more and more willing to let you call the shots as time passes... You begin to lick Simone's heavenly soles as they pass over your face. You're so turned on now that you cant really think straight anymore. Perhaps a few more moments and you could ask Simone to... No no no! Bad Shanna! Save that for in private... But Madeline isn't here... No! It's still bad... Simone: Ok everyone. Time for the switcheroo! Hannah and CeCe take Simone's spot and begin rubbing their sexy feet on your face while Simone begins to lick your own feet...
15532.title: Robopocalypse

info.brief_description: Shanna from Super X forms her own team to help out DJ and her old teammates
info.description:
Crime has gotten so bad that Shanna decided to create her own superhero team to help DJ and Super X out, it's been a few months, so Shanna has... changed a little bit... let's just say an experiment of hers went wrong and she now has a raging foot fetish. Anyway, here are the rules.

RULES
1.) No shrinking
2.) No guy feet
3.) Nothing too weird
4.) No one is to die
5.) No ending chapters
